nodes.text: Perush-anon Seedia was an individual who died at the hands of the New Republic by the time of the Battle of Jakku in 5 ABY. During the battle, Palal Seedia, a TIE fighter pilot in the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, lamented Perush, with whom she shared the same last name, and other comrades she had lost to the New Republic when confronting the New Republic pilot Wyl Lark.
Perush-anon Seedia was mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
